name: Down by the Dwarfs
description:
Down by the Dwarfs

You will be a young goblin that gets lost in a dwarf dungeon and want to come back home. Ensure to stay unseen because you have no combat skills in this stealth adventure. Dodge the fields of view and be quiet, the dwarfs are attentive. But be carefully traps and puzzles will make your way home more difficult.

Currently, it's only a prototype but I will add graphics, sounds and more content. I have plans for different enemy types, more traps, puzzles and levels. 
If you have ideas for me or find issues, I would be glad about a comment otherwise have fun with this game.
